member.name: T:CMS.WebFarmSync.WebFarmServerStatusEnum
member.summary: Web farm server status enum.

member.name: F:CMS.WebFarmSync.WebFarmServerStatusEnum.Healthy
member.summary: Healthy means that the server is responding in a timely manner.

member.name: F:CMS.WebFarmSync.WebFarmServerStatusEnum.Transitioning
member.summary: Transitioning means that the server status cannot be properly determined. This can happen when web farm server starts or his status changes from healthy to not responding and vice versa.

member.name: F:CMS.WebFarmSync.WebFarmServerStatusEnum.NotResponding
member.summary: Not responding means that the server is not responding at all.

member.name: F:CMS.WebFarmSync.WebFarmServerStatusEnum.AutoDisabled
member.summary: Server was automatically disabled (memory tasks removed and stopped generating new ones).

member.name: T:CMS.WebFarmSync.AnonymousTasksProcessor
member.summary: Class responsible for processing anonymous tasks.
member.remarks: Anonymous tasks are a way to run webfarm tasks on instance without webfarms enabled. Processor also bypasses license limitations. Processing is started by and a batch of size is processed.

member.summary: File name of the file for web farm server notification

member.summary: Physical path to the watcher folder for web farm server notification.

member.summary: File watcher to notify web farm server to process tasks.

member.name: M:CMS.WebFarmSync.AnonymousTasksProcessor.GetNotificationPath
member.summary: Gets default notification path for given server physical path

member.name: M:CMS.WebFarmSync.AnonymousTasksProcessor.NotifyServer
member.summary: Notifies instance to process a batch of anonymous webfarm tasks.

member.name: M:CMS.WebFarmSync.AnonymousTasksProcessor.RegisterWatchers
member.summary: Initializes file system watchers

member.summary: Handles changed event of file system watcher.

member.summary: Gets dataset with anonymous tasks with additional information about presence of binary data of the tasks.

Thrown when task with type has been already registered.

member.name: M:CMS.WebFarmSync.WebFarmService.RegisterTask(System.Type,System.Boolean,CMS.Core.WebFarmTaskOptimizeActionEnum)
member.summary: Registers a new web farm task type to allow its processing within the system. The type must inherit .
member.param: The type of task to register.
Indicates if the task modifies only memory. Memory tasks can be deleted on application start.
Determines type of optimization which is used for reducing number of generated web farm tasks of particular type.
member.exception: Thrown when is null.
Thrown when does not inherit or does not have parameterless constructor.
Thrown when task with type has been already registered.

member.name: M:CMS.WebFarmSync.WebFarmService.RegisterTask``1(System.Boolean,CMS.Core.WebFarmTaskOptimizeActionEnum)
member.summary: Registers a new web farm task type to allow its processing within the system. The type must inherit .
member.param: Indicates if the task modifies memory only. Memory tasks can be deleted on application start.
Determines type of optimization which is used for reducing number of generated web farm tasks of particular type.
member.exception: Thrown when task to be registered does not have parameterless constructor.
Thrown when task has been already registered.
